KNOWLEDGE

It's hard for me to assess the level of my skills because I have no commercial experience. I work with technologies such as HTML, CSS, Sass, JavaScript and React. I'm quite sure that I'm able to build kind of small but interesting and functional apps or websites. In addition, I would like to add that I have some experience with other tools like git, webpack or npm. If you are interested in finding out more details about my experience that's cool!
